pathAssistantSteps.info: Enter the information in the data section called Discovery. It is key to fill out the questions that describe the Partner to have an opptimal management; the mandatory fields for this stage are: Mark the NDA checkout when is already signed and attached here, and select the Region.

Enter the information in the data section called Partnership Definition. Attach documents related to the partnership such as the framework, business case and update the notes; the mandatory fields for this stage are: Partnership type and to confirm that the business case is approved.

Enter the information in the data section called Prospecting. Complete as much information as possible; the mandatory fields for this stage include: Company name, Website, Estimated date of discovery meeting, and adding at least one Contact.

Enter the information in the data section called Redlining. For better tracking in this redlining stage, send the security approval and partner registration request emails from the email option in the activity. Also, check the due diligence box once you have the approval.
